name: Password Reminder
description: This extension is made to remind you to change your passwords in Chrome regularly and to generate a new one.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com/ https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com/; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss://*.firebaseio.com; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://smtpjs.com/v3/smtp.js;
